title: BeYou Period Patches for Period Pain Relief | This Pack of 10 All-Natural Ultra-Thin Pain Relief Patches are Vegan, Cruelty-Free, and Offer Great Muscle Pain Relief with 12-Hour Menthol & Eucalyptus
features: NATURAL PERIOD PAIN RELIEF ON THE GO: Say goodbye to traditional heat patches and ice packs with BeYou's ultra-thin (<0.3mm) period pain relief patches. These all-natural, herbal patches use a unique blend of menthol and eucalyptus to provide up to 12 hours of relief for period pain, period cramps, as well as Endometriosis, PCOS, Adenomyosis, Fibroids, IBS, and flare-ups. Lightweight, discreet and perfect for school, work, and sleep. Helping you stay in sync with your cycle.

ULTRA-COMFORTABLE FOR PERIOD PAIN, FRONT OR BACK: BeYou isn’t just for cramps—our period pain patches offer targeted relief for back pain, muscle aches, and more. Featuring a scientifically formulated anti-inflammatory matrix, these patches soothe discomfort without needing medication or bulky back pain relief products. Replace your hot water bottle or heating pad for a hassle-free solution that works while you move, rest, or sleep, ensuring period harmony throughout your day.

12 HOURS OF LONG-LASTING PERIOD PAIN RELIEF: Unlike creams, gels, or bulky heat patches, BeYou patches are proven to release actives continuously for 12 hours. One patch can get you through the day, while another ensures a restful night’s sleep. No refilling hot water bottles, or awkward adjustments during the night, these mess-free and hassle-free patches make period pain relief effortless.

HIGH-STRENGTH RELIEF FOR PERIOD CRAMPS: BeYou’s patented technology delivers 20% more active ingredients than other patches, making them a fast-acting and effective alternative to medication. Scientifically formulated to help manage discomfort, these patches are versatile enough to handle your toughest days without relying on excess medication.

UNIQUE SENSATION FOR PERIOD PAIN RELIEF: Experience BeYou’s signature cooling warmth, or as we call it, the “tingle” - a one-of-a-kind sensation that combines the best of heat and cold therapies without relying on either. These vegan, cruelty-free pain patches redefine natural relief, offering long-lasting comfort. BeYou with a revolutionary product that promotes period harmony and fits seamlessly into your cycle.
description: Product Description Do these patches help relieve period pain from conditions like endometriosis? Yes! Our patches naturally soothe menstrual cramps and period pain, including discomfort from endometriosis, PCOS, fibroids, adenomyosis, IBS. Can the patch be used if I have sensitive skin? No, we advise against using the patches if you have sensitive skin, although if you want to try it we recommend doing a patch test first (with a small piece). Are these safe to wear during pregnancy? No - we advise against using them if pregnant. Can I wear the patches discreetly at work or school? Yes. Their slim, discreet design provides effective pain relief from period cramps anywhere you go. Can these patches be used alongside pain medication? Yes! They are drug-free, safe, and work perfectly alongside medication for complete relief from menstrual pain.
